resources.string: Start by entering your name and categorie below.
Enter your login details to access your account
This App will send you an SMS message for verification and standard rates apply.. Kindly enter your phone Number
Seems like you forgot your password for OJ Susu and Loans. If this is true, click below to reset your password.
Pin Codes Are Not The Same
The home of convenient daily Susu. Make your daily Susu and have full access to your fund at anytime.
Get online loans instantly, with no collateral from GHS50 to GHS20,000 with low interest rate.
Make transactions without walking into our Office. Get customer support anytime whiles using our app.
Ohemeng James Enterprise(Bimbo finance) is an agent to some financial institution in Ghana, providing credit to eligible borrowers, especially SMEs in Ghana.

Flexible repayment terms are chosen by the applicant, payable in one or multiple installments, depending on eligibility. The loans are intended to assist micro-entrepreneurs with working capital to grow their businesses, and not to service long-term debt obligations.

Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR) is 60%. This is based on an interest set to 0.255% per day and decreases with good repayment behavior. Processing fee per loan of GHS 50 to GHS 100 is GHS 5 to GHS 10 depending on the amount, this amount is deducted from the loan before disbursement.

A borrower who receives GHS 1,000 loan for a 180-day term, would be charged an interest rate of 0.255% per day, thus GHS 250 in 180 days, and a processing fee of GHS 50 summing up to a total repayment of GHS 1,300. GHS50 will be deducted from the principal. • In summary: GHS1,000 (borrowed amount), minus GHS50. GHS250 (interest) + GHS50 (processing fee) = GHS1,300 (total payment) • The borrower has the flexibility to make early repayments at any point which may reduce the above-stated interest.

Contact us at 

0269237403 for more details. 


We respect your privacy and confidentiality of your personal information and data. 


https://www.bimbofinance.app/privacy-policy-statement
